thread.title: Charlotte Crosby insists she’s not pregnant and shows off her flat stomach just hours after telling fans she’s got ‘the worst hangover ever’ on Snapchat
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby insists she’s not pregnant and shows off her flat stomach just hours after telling fans she’s got ‘the worst hangover ever’ on Snapchat

author: Rebecca Pocklington
title: Charlotte Crosby insists she’s not pregnant and shows off her flat stomach just hours after telling fans she’s got ‘the worst hangover ever’ on Snapchat
text:
TV Magazine 'I'M NOT PREGNANT!' Charlotte Crosby insists she’s not pregnant and shows off her flat stomach just hours after telling fans she’s got ‘the worst hangover ever’ on Snapchat 
The former Geordie Shore star hit back at recent claims she's expecting a baby By REBECCA POCKLINGTON
